content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to describe your daily routine in Italian, from morning to evening. Let's start with the morning!

data.tip: The 'gli' sound is similar to the 'lli' in the English word 'million'.

content.text: To say 'at' a certain time in Italian, use `alle` before the number. For example, `alle sette`.
For modes of transport like cars, trains, or bikes, use the preposition `in`.

content.title: Morning Routine
content.setting: Your Italian friend Marco asks about your morning.

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ciao! Parliamo della tua routine. Di solito, a che ora ti svegli?

conversation_flow.title: Say what time you usually wake up

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Capito. E per colazione, cosa mangi?

conversation_flow.title: Mention what you eat for breakfast

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Buono! E come vai al lavoro?

conversation_flow.title: Explain how you travel to work

data.tip: The 'sc' sound here is hard, like the 'sk' in 'skate'.

content.text: For one o'clock, we say `l'una` (singular). So to say 'at one', you say `all'una`.

content.title: Workday
content.setting: The conversation continues. You now talk about your workday.

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Perfetto. E il pomeriggio? A che ora inizi di lavorare?

conversation_flow.title: State what time you start working

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ok. E quando pranzi di solito?

conversation_flow.title: Say what time you usually have lunch

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Bene. E a che ora finisci di lavorare?

conversation_flow.title: Mention what time you finish your work day

content.text: A simple and very common way to ask a question back to someone is to use `E tu?`, which means 'And you?'.

content.title: Evening Routine
content.setting: You're finishing the conversation by talking about your evening.

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Capito. E dopo il lavoro cosa fai?

conversation_flow.title: Describe what you typically do after work

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Interessante! E a che ora ceni?

conversation_flow.title: Say what time you usually eat dinner

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Perfetto. La mia routine è semplice.

conversation_flow.title: Ask about their routine in return

conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Io? Di solito faccio sport. Grazie per la conversazione! Ciao!

content.text: Great job! You can now describe your daily routine from morning to evening. Keep practicing these phrases!
